templates.id: Workbooks/Global Secure Access/Microsoft Entra Internet Access/Enriched Microsoft 365 logs
templates.author: Microsoft
templates.name: Enriched Microsoft 365 logs
templates.description: This comprehensive workbook offers a robust solution for monitoring the health of logs acquired by Global Secure Access (GSA). It provides real-time insights into latency and event predictability while identifying and enriching discrepancies in the data, particularly IP information. Enhance your security posture with detailed analytics and actionable intelligence.
